b: ^I am what I eat. I'll choose an ingredient that conveys the feelings I want to deliver them.
^I must go back to the spirit lands soon.

s2: ^The light is beautiful through the canopy of Havenwood.
s3: ^It smells of petrichor and wet bark.

apple_tooltip: ^Sweet and sparkly, juicy, perfectly crunchy. Its smell has hints of tea leaves and cocoa.
leaf_tooltip: ^It shivers in the wind, like its feeling cold - but it's warm to the touch. Hold it gently, or it will break.
feather_tooltip: ^Given as a gift by an old stork, blue like the sky, gentle, its wingspan twenty meters large. Hold it to your ear and you'll hear a distant summer storm.

default_intro_low: ^ at least one more thing before the end of the day!

s0: ^What can I do anyway, I have to
^ for this year's high school administrative
^I sat at the table of a café,
^ under the warm heat of the autumn sun.
^Is there anything better in the world?
s1: ^I found no more enjoyable way to work so far.

s0: ^It is so nice to feel good!

s1: ^I know I have to appreciate it when I'm high, for it can

s2: ^ the administrative file for my disability aids

dance_1: ^Waah! Dance class was crazy. I'm spent.
^I know I shouldn't push myself like that, but I can't help it!
students_1: ^What's gotten into them? This day was the best, I swear.
autumn_A_1: ^I don't like when the days get shorter.
^Although the burning colors of autumn are beautiful, it hardly cheers me up.
autumn_B_1: ^I am usually really apprehensive about autumn.
^So far everything went right, but my mood can deteriorate so quickly.
operation_announcement_1: ^Okay so Druid Stork the town healer told me they will need to proceed with a

b: ^check quickly if everything is okay. It's like a routine.
^It'll be nothing more like a routine.
^Maybe I'll need some physical therapy, to be sure that I entirely recover my mobility.
^I should entirely recover my mobility, the chances of success are quite high.
^I might entirely recover my mobility, but the chances of success are low.
^I went to see Druid Stork and we realized a complete check on my hips.
^Apparently, given my dance practicing, I might only need some few physical therapy to maintain it perfectly functionnal until the end of my days.
^Apparently, given my dance practicing, I will only need some few physical therapy to maintain it perfectly functionnal until the end of my days.
^I know Druid Stork had told me I had no reason to worry, but apparently I moved a lot during these height hours of anesthesia.
^Druid Stork said we were lucky at some point. Apparently I moved a lot during these height hours of anesthesia.

psychologist_medication_1: ^Doctor Spicey my psychologist suggested that we change the doses of my medications, the time my situation settles down.
^After twelve years she knows me well. We'll see in two weeks if it gets better.
children_A_1: ^What's the time? Oh... Vick must be sleeping already. Alix's probably hard at work.
^And Barjov? No idea. Maybe at the theatre with some friends.
feeling_trash_1: ^Why can't I just be a functionnal human being living normally in good health and doing normal activities that make them happy?!
hips_feeling_okay_1: ^Maybe I forced a bit too much tonight.
^I'm still feeling my hips, gonna stretch myself again.
hips_hurting_a_bit_1: ^I still feel my hips since last week, plus I quite had to stop my dance class in advance tonight.

b: ^I was so relieved to hear that.
^It will took me some time to recover.
^After all these years, I would I hated to hear that I had past the age to dance.
^I won't be able to dance for the whole month.
^Six months at least before dancing any move, then stating agin little by little.
^I love that so much. It's like my reason to live.
^I'm not very glad of that. Six months is so long.
^Although every other student in my jazz and classic classes are younglings, when it comes to dance I sure am the most impatient of all.
^I don't know if I'll be that patient. I hope that will do.

children_A_2: ^I really oughta write my children more often. I'm the worst parent...
^No, no, shut up. You're just chill. Come on, it's bedtime now.
late_A_1: ^What time is it? Oh damn, I spent so much time cooking!
^Let's just leave everything like that, I need to wake up early tomorrow...
late_B_1: ^Let's just eat anything quickly, I'll do the dishes when coming back from high school tomorrow.
tired_1: ^Pfff anyway, I'm spent, I'll do the dishes tomorrow.
feeling_crap_1: ^Who could ever want to be my friend? I am not even able to take care of me, of my house, of my life!
^I am so pissed off of staying alone and having no energy!
going_out_1: ^I'm so full of joy and energy tonight!
^Definitively not going to go to bed early.  Why not going out?

b: ^Anyway, I still have a little thing to
^ for tomorrow before to go to bed.
^Anyway, I have all my lessons to write for my students until I come back.

default_end: ^Well, I guess it had to happen some day, it sucks that we won't be even friends, but I guess it couldn't have gone any other way anyway...
^I wish we'll still reconnect sometime in the future, but I can't really stand here moping forever
dragon_riding_exam: ^I think I might really get the hang of this dragon riding stuff, my teacher said they had great hopes for me and I love the perspective of flying a rescue dragon for people that need assistance, it the kind oh hobby that makes you feel useful
dragon_riding_exam_failed: ^I am still training regularly for the next batch of dragon riding exam, it's a lot of work but I am getting the hang of it more and more, and it's still a blast to train with those magnificent creatures no matter what.
no_dragon_riding: ^I think next year I'll try getting into dragon riding, it's shame I couldn't bring myself to start it now, but I still need time for myself with everything happening, when I'll be ready it'll surely go smoothly
dragon_adopt_center: ^The dragon center shopkeeper called me back, I have a part time job there as an assistant baby dragon keeper, I am looking forward to helping the cute little monsters, and the staff seems really nice, I had a first day were I was feeling anxious and started crying, but they were very supportive and I still have the job.
magic_singing_end: ^I am training more and more to perform magical singing, everyday I sing a little bit for myself, and more and more I manage to sing in front of friends, even stranger now ! I hope I get to a point were I could go on stage at some point, in front of a small crowd.

credits_tooltip: ^Bird chirps and wind howl maker: KT

s0: ^ the way I do about her?
^ over someone who might not give a shit at all.

s3: ^I don't know, I just want to talk a bit.
s4: ^Will I ever get to talk to her again?

s1: ^ so much efforts all the time

s2: ^But no matter how hard I try,

s0: ^wants to do anything with me anymore.

b: ^applying for a job at Tiny Hoard Cave

lonely_1: ^It's been so long since I have been alone like this...
school_1: ^It's been days since I even attended school.
no_motivation_1: ^I can't read, I can't even bring myself to do magic anymore.
^It's as if I wasn't just missing her but a part of myself...
dragon_riding_1: ^I learned the dragon riding club is opening soon.
^... Shouldn't I at leat give it a try?

b: ^She seemed a little bit reassured about my situation.
^She seemed worried about me, almost angry.
^She seems to be glad to hear I was doing good.

rough_1: ^These past few days were... rough, but I didn't expect... That.
^It's like, things made sense, for month, like never before. But now...

b: ^ talked excitedly about her new partner.
^They seem so interesting, I got very curious.

s0: ^I guess I understand why she wanted to be with them.
s1: ^Maybe she didn't left just because of me.
s2: ^I hope I'll get to meet them, maybe we could all be friends.

b: ^ asked me how I was doing, I said I was taking care of myself, trying to get better.
^ talked about our past, before we were dating. We reminisced about our childhood.
^She seemed pensive, maybe a bit melancholic...
^I thought about how those days were nice even if we weren't like together together, I wish we could have that again.

^What was I thinking, of course she doesn't care. For a week she ghosts me and now she is pissed that I don't have anything to say and that I slack off in my house doing nothing, she's the one that put me in that headspace.
^A childhood friend, then lover, then goner, in a few weeks, and I have nothing to say.

^We talked again with Luna, I feel like we almost had an argument about what I was doing with my life, but she calmed down when we talked about some of the things I did since our break up, but it feels like she has a lot going on in her life, she's on edge.

^I had the occasion to talk to Luna, she was pissed off at me but we manage to calm down and talk, I saw something was off with her so I tried to understand what she was going through, she didn't explain it clearly but at least it put an end to the argument and now we're cool.

^I had the greatest time since my break up talking with Luna, she opened to me about struggling between our break up and her new relationship, life in general, worrying about me, it feels she needed to talk to someone and I am still close enough that she feels safe saying this to me. I am happy I am still important to her...

dragon_riding_2: ^I didn't find it in me to go to dragon riding class, it looked fun, but it's also exhausting, and I am so tired of everything right now.
passion_dragon_riding_2: ^I really wish we could be going to the dragon riding class with Luna, she promised a long time ago she would accompany me for the first few class days, I'll ask her.
nostalgia_dragon_riding_2: ^I remember riding Arrow's dragon when I was a kid, that's one of my dearest memories, I can't wait to go to that class, I am not missing out this time !
care_dragon_riding_2: ^I really need this dragon riding course, it's everything I ever dreamed of, it's sad the Luna is not there, but I can't wait for her for this. I might ask some of my friends if they wanna go with me instead.
fuck_1: ^I always heard that the first break up hurt the most, but [i]fuck[/i].
childhood_1: ^We were together since childhood, is that nothing to her ?
^I can't believe she'd dump me like that.
thoughts_of_dragon_riding_1: ^What was that about becoming dragon riders together, huh?
^All our promises, thrown to the wind...
ace_and_kazzie_1: ^Come to think of it, I could really use a pet.
^But the tent is way too flammable, even for a tiny dragon like that.

everything_stopped_1: ^It seems like everything just stopped, right then and there when she left.
thoughts_of_dragon_riding_2: ^Am I letting my life escape me?
^What am I doing... I'd always thought I'd be a dragon tamer by now.
^But I can't seem to do much more than moping around...
crying_to_sleep_1: ^How am I to go on without her?
^When she's already found someone new, and I am just crying myself to sleep.

s1: ^Let's see... 1 upper chimeara and 2 basic ones? Good job, girl!
s2: ^We caught 3 upper chimearas today. What a bounty!

s0: ^What an exhausting day it was. Wasn't it, Ace?
s1: ^It's now time to butcher and dry our hunting booty. Ready, Ace?!

s0: ^ We had only met a chimeara like that once before. You remember, girl?
s1: ^There was a weird smell in the woods today, we should invest it.

s0: ^ What a unusual week. Right, girl?
s1: ^We hadn't had a week like that in like... forever?

s0: ^ It was surprisely restful not to go hunting last week. What do you think, girl?
s1: ^Did you enjoy hanging out in the city this week?
^[i] A grunt of approval is heard in the cabin [/i]

s0: ^ I should play it cool on my ankle.
s1: ^How much longer can last a sprain?

s0: ^ do a stocktake of our loot.
s2: ^ration our food for the coming weeks.

s0: ^ the work needs to be done.

s3: ^My bones are feeling weak from the day

s0: ^ and I didn't get any sleep yet.

s1: ^I'll just wash my teeth with the morning dew
s2: ^I'll just read a few pages of my book about skynimals

s0: ^I miss the smell of the forest.
^Recovered or not, I have to get out
s1: ^I can't stand staying home another week.

s2: ^I'm in such a good shape tonight.
s3: ^I'm craving the thrill of the hunt.

s0: ^I think we should take it easy tomorrow.
s2: ^Tomorrow, it's better if we stay in town.

s1: ^I need to give myself time to recover.
s2: ^It would be unwise to keep straining the wound.
s3: ^We can't go out again just yet, girl.

s0: ^We won't be hunting anytime soon, Ace.
s1: ^We could use some time at home.
^What have I done to deserve this?
s2: ^I need to be careful, the pain keeps getting worse.

s0: ^I should take it easy with my new ankle, right?
^How about we wander around the tree a bit, girl?
s1: ^What say you, should we take some us-time?
s2: ^Let's keep practicing a bit of self-care.

sprain_ankle_1: ^Behind the pile of broken arrows! Please!
^I need to make a splint. I can't get stuck at home.
blind_1: ^ACE, HEEL OVER! Closer, skin to skin. Are we home?
^I can't see shit. I'll just spend the evening in the dark.
^We'll go to the town healer in the morning.
stork_4: ^It was interessted to assit druid Stork, don't you think?

b: ^[b] ARROW -[/b] Please, don't run on the way next time it's dangerous for me.
^[b] AAROW-[/b] Thank you, Ace, you guided me well today.
^Did you think I could handle your shit with my twisted ankle?
^Do you think we've got time for your shit?

argument_1: ^Am I really going to have to climb down
argument_2: ^By the name of the goddess, Ace! What's gotten into you?
^You can't just burn Dr. Spicey's paraglider!
^I already have a hard enough time making any connections here...

mess_1: ^Ugh... Look at the mess in this cabin.
^Haha, yes, girl! You certainly help trash the place.
meat_1: ^Come on! We caught it today ourselves, dummy. Eat up.
sprain_ankle_2: ^[i]The creature lets out a worried moan.[/i]
weapon_1: ^Time to re-sharpen my arrow heads using my favorite iron cap oil to strengthen the metal and they'll be perfect.
^Oh, my pots of oil are almost empty.
weapon_2: ^Oh no... I'm out of cap shrooms oil.
^I'll have to stop in town next week. You'll Comme with me, Ace?
weapon_3: ^Once a week, I treat my bow using wood cap oil. Tonight's the night.
^Ah! How I love the strong scent of a newly opened pot!
stork_2: ^I came across the town healer Stork,
^they talked my ear off for an hour about white magic.
^and how they'd like to have me for day. But time is limited.
stork_3: ^Well this is RICH. Druid Stork told me they couldn't fix my eyes.

b: ^ What would I want to learn useless white magic with them for?

stork_3: ^I guess I'm gonna have to live like that, now.
stork_5: ^Stork insisted on having me as their assistant pretending the extra hands could help. It feels good to be
stork_6: ^Today the clinic was empty. Stork tested my resonance with white magic.
^It seems I could have a way. I'm excited.

b: ^Stork said with the magic freely flowing in me, time and patience, I could recover sight. I'm so happy.
^Beside the clinic I spend my days listening to white magic books reading themselves.

skip_meal_1: ^I don't feel like cooking just for myself.
^Guess I'll just skip a meal tonight.
skip_meal_2: ^Seeing Ace eat makes me a little hungry, too.
^But I guess I'll just skip another meal.
skip_meal_3: ^Maybe I'd need someone else to cook for me.
^But my last friend fucked off years ago.
straight_to_bed_1: ^Well, fuck it. Straight to bed it is.
^I need at least 4 hours of sleep anyways.
stork_1: ^[b] ARROW - [/b] I should go see druid Stork tomorrow about my ankle.
^I never have time to visit them otherwise...

b: ^It's been a long time, I had echoes of you recent break up, I know how dear she was to you.

s0: ^You're doing great, you can do whatever you put your mind to.
s1: ^You are improving, I can see it, don't give up on anything.
s2: ^It's not always easy I know, but you have it in you to keep going!
s3: ^If you are anxious, breath, drink water, and try to take a nap once in a while under the sun.
s4: ^Your anxieties can hit you like a mega dragon some times, but they are not everything you feel, you have so much in you.
s5: ^There is so many things you must feel right now, it's overwhelming, but you can do it.
s6: ^If you think everything is going the wrong way, remember that nothing is set in stone.
s7: ^You're future can always be brighter and brighter, believe in yourself.
s8: ^I send you all the positives energies the trees can muster, and hope they will guide you well.

care_1: ^You should care more about yourself, go make friends, people appreciate you presence.
care_2: ^Seeing new people and people you already know could make you feel much better, you don't deserve to be alone.
care_3: ^Don't stay alone moping, there are people who could benefit from seeing you, and reciprocally.
care_4: ^Take care of yourself and your dream, they matter, and not only to you, to people around you
care_5: ^You'll find friends whatever you choose to do, people will like you everywhere you'll go.
care_6: ^Being alone with your thought you'll hurt yourself more and more, there is beauty everywhere around you go find it and revel in it.
care_7: ^Your head is your worst enemy right now, so you should see more heads, new heads, don't isolate yourself too much.
dragon_riding_1: ^I have seen dragon riding classes are starting, Luna has other things going on, but friends could be there for you too, follow your dreams but you don't have to be all on your own.
magic_singing_1: ^You could try and learn a new skill and make friends along the way, I think your neighbor knows about magical singing, you might like giving it a go ?
pet_dragon_1: ^You know what makes goof company when your lonely ? Pets ! I know how much you love animals, I bet you could handle one if you put your mind to it !
birthday_1: ^If I remembered correctly your birthday is coming, I bet you have people living around you that would benefit from celebrating with you, and you would too.

nostalgia_1: ^Everything you did in your life matters, you can reconnect with it and it's a blessing, don't leave it behind.
nostalgia_2: ^Some times it feels like the present is a storm, but you can always relax in the calm weather of you past.
nostalgia_3: ^You can find the keys to your future in morsels and memories, emotions of the past can still be achieved.
nostalgia_4: ^Sit down, take a look into those moments you used to love back in the day, there is so many things in there.
nostalgia_5: ^You can learn from the past as much as you can from the present, and your future may depend on both.
nostalgia_6: ^You are young but your past is immense, you have so much to get from it, don't forget it.
nostalgia_7: ^Don't forget to take time for yourself and reflect on what you did in your life, the feelings, the choices, the good and the bad.
dragon_riding_1: ^I have seen dragon riding classes are starting, you had it in you since you were a kid, you don't need anyone to help you attend this training !
magic_singing_1: ^I bet you could start magical singing, you loved songs as a kid, you could be the one singing the now !
pet_dragon_1: ^You know what could make you feel better, just like when you were a kid, playing with animals, I know how much you love them, I bet it'll make you feel better !
birthday_1: ^Your birthday is right around the corner, you should do things you use to do for your birthdays, reconnect with moments of your childhood you liked.

passion_1: ^Luna matters a lot to you, you can still have her around and do stuff with her, she isn't gone.
passion_2: ^Don't you think you could see Luna a little bit, I know you miss her, and you shouldn't stay too much on your own.
passion_3: ^I know love can be painful at time, but it's not because you don't date someone that your love towards them don't matter.
passion_4: ^Your love is strong, it is important, you should passion about it, and passion about yourself, they both work in unison.
passion_5: ^You should take inspiration from the love you have for Luna, and direct it at yourself, you deserve it, she'd like seeing you happy.
passion_6: ^You have a lot of love in you, don't let it all go away, hold on to it and become stronger and better because of it.
passion_7: ^You are passionate and loving, foster those qualities, they'll make you into someone amazing.
dragon_riding_1: ^I have seen dragon riding classes are starting, if I remember correctly you and Luna had a promise on that topic, I know it's important to you, hold on to that.
magic_singing_1: ^You should work on something, skills and passion, you know Luna loved magical singing, maybe you could connect with it too ?
pet_dragon_1: ^Having a pet is a lot of time and responsibility, with your current state, maybe you could find another way to see animals without having to take care of them ?
birthday_1: ^I know your birthday is coming soon, you can't stay alone for the big day, Luna attended to all your birthdays since you met, I bet she wants to come.

b: ^Previous letter I sent you was last autumn. Already one year ago, time flies!

s0: ^I'm trying to reach out to you
s1: ^I'm writing this message thinking about you

s0: ^This time of the year makes me want to share things with you.
^ I hope you have received my last letters.
s1: ^I hope the letters I sent you did you some good.

b: ^I'm going to be away a long time. But you can go on with your life without me, now.

little_bird_1: ^What did I tell you? The little bird never lies. You should to take it easy on yourself.
kazzie_1: ^Did you know your neighbour Kazzie was all over dragons stuff? I'm sure Ace would agree.
care_1: ^A little bird told me that you might be pushing the limits of your body to keep hunting.
care_2: ^Nobody could resent you but yourself if you took a week off. How you're spending your time is up to you.
care_3: ^It's difficult to listen to yourself if you're always busy. Don't hesitate to take a break.
care_4: ^Don't be ashame to try something new because you would be bad at it in the beginning. It's the first step to re-discover yourself.
care_5: ^When you wonder, the answer is often already in you. If you're still hesitating, you can ask Ace's opinion!
care_6: ^There is not always just one option, one way to live your life.
care_7: ^You find a certain peace when your body and mind work together to meet your needs.

hunt_memory_1: ^When you went on your first hunt, you had hurt this same ankle on a root out of excitement, before the event even started.
stork_1: ^I told you they were still around! It was good to see your school friend Stork, like in the good old days.
nostalgia_1: ^Maybe you should hang out with people your age, once in a while. It might do you good to feel understood. What about that Mx. Stork?
nostalgia_2: ^You have to know you're the best hunter.ess I've ever met, Arrow. Your control is precise, your aim is true, you shoot only once.
nostalgia_3: ^Okay, about that Stork kid you used to be in school with... I've done my research they're still around Heavenwood, as the town healer.
nostalgia_4: ^I admire you a lot. You've been hunting since you're 14! Don't you ever get bored?
nostalgia_5: ^You've spent your life to master the art of hunting. This is something you can be proud of.
nostalgia_6: ^Did you know one of your grandparent was a white mage? But when they met their lovers they started dedicating their life to hunting, the three of them.
nostalgia_7: ^By digging your past you can learn more about yourself, analyse every decision you made to arrive when your stand. Don't be harsh on yourself if it was't what you expected.

obstacle_1: ^Every path has its share of struggles and you have to bravely persevere to overcome the obstacles. Don't panic, treated fairly, any injury heals enventually.
obstacle_2: ^I'm sorry about what happened, Arrow. Sometimes, when you rush on a path, it can lead to recklessness. But where one path ends, another starts. Don't despair!
passion_1: ^I think it's great that you keep doing what you love,
^especially if it's for the last times. Enjoy it as much as you can.
passion_2: ^If you are lucky enough to have people who take care of you, it is important to give them due respect.
passion_3: ^Everybody think they know what's best for you, but in the end it's up to you to forge your destiny.
passion_4: ^When you're living with someone it's sometimes easy to get lost in a routine. Be carefull to keep paying attention to your loved ones.
passion_5: ^Whatever you might be doing of your time lately, I hope you can find some pleasure into it.
passion_6: ^Cherish every moment you spend with Ace, hunting. They will be a part of you forever. You can still feel the wind, ear the wind in the leafs, skynimals squealing above you.
passion_7: ^We've talked about paths of life a lot. I'm so proud of what you accomplished and of who you are now. You sure grew up a lot for someone your age.

b: ^It has been a while since I wrote you for the last time.
^I still have in mind howm much your home used to be lively.

s0: ^I hope this letter finds you well.
^I can feel your energy streaming from here.
^Don't forget to listen to yourself a bit,

singing_1: ^Do you still enjoy singing you heart out all along the weekend in that little confortable house of yours ? I know how much it makes you fell free. Plus, your have such a clear voice.
everyday_pleasure_1: ^I hope you do take some time for yourself, resting a bit and enjoying the small things of life everyday.
strong_1: ^I know things are not always easy, but you are stronger than you think. Bringing up three children on your own, and making them the beautiful persons thay are, is an achievement most of us would be incapable of.
not_perfect_1: ^You don't have to be perfect tou know. People who like you will not stop just by knowing you better. They are just as imperfect as you are, with both their qualities and their flaws.
sleep_1: ^Do you rest better at night since you got that sleeping machine from the town druid of Nightfall? I know they are experts in fixing the problems of sleep apnea.
medication_1: ^You seem to be gradually less struggling with your bipolar disorder, do you not? It means that Doctor Spicey and yourself are getting closer to the right proportion in your medications. I am sure that you will reach it eventually!
neighbour_1: ^What a wonderful neighbourhood you live in! Why not inviting one of your nextbranch neighbours to a four-hand cooking session some day? It would not surprise me they are lovely persons.

barjov_1: ^Do you remember that Barjov had been working with that stagehand in the Great Opera house? Apparently they went on a tour with some bard group. I saw them exhausted but happy.
alix_1: ^I met Alix recently, he bought a great house in Hightree. I believe they were thinking about setting up a family reunion someday. You should write them, I think they would love it!
vick_1: ^Did Vick tell you that they had finally decided to pass the mathemagical exam for teaching at the end of the year? Do you believe that they found her way after all? Maybe you could ask them.
neighbour_1: ^I remember the time when you moved here with the children. Old Arrow and young Kazzie already lived in the tree, and you had sworn to get along quickly with them. Life runs so fast...
distant_friend_1: ^Do you know how your old friend Malon is doing since their last year mountaineering adventure? Maybe there is a way to plan spending a part of the Christmas holidays with them and their daughter Luna?
bts_1: ^Did you see that the 'Burning Tin Singers' have revealed the program of their next tour?! In three months they're coming in town! You have to take tickets! Is there anyone you could offer to go with?
family_reunion_1: ^Thanks to you, Alix finally settled a date for your family reunion. This is awesome! I will leave you with your family then, no doubt that you will be well surrounded. Enjoy it to the fullest!

alain_1: ^What was your dance teacher's name already? I remember that competition a few years back, he was on fire! I hope he still got it.
jazz_classic_1: ^Still at the top of your game? I remember how you do rule your jazz and classic dance classes!
radiant_1: ^You look radiant this week. Would you not like to go out one of these days? I think you could ask one of your friends, it has been a while since you haven not spent some time with them.
easy_1: ^I know how crazy you are about dancing. And you dance like hell, you really are the best! Do not forget to go easy and to mind your hip.
show_1: ^Is your winter dance show ready yet? I heard they had given you the central role, despite your age. All of your younger comrade must be very impresssed!
show_2: ^Damn, this show was amazing! You are so stunning when you dance. If I could, I would definitively spend the night dancing with you.
proposition_1: ^I think you are an outstanding person, and spending time with you have to be incredible. If you like it, you should really accept the invitation that charming person made to you the other day.
